@BOOK{Book:{{ .ID }},
    TITLE = "{{ .Title }}",
    AUTHOR = "{{ range $i, $v := .Authors }}{{ if ne $i 0 }} and {{ end }}{{ $v }}{{ end }}{{ with .Creators }}{{ range . }} and {{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }}"{{ if .Publisher }},
    PUBLISHER = {{ "{" }}{{ .Publisher }}{{ "}" }}{{ end }}{{ if gt .PublicationDate.Year 1 }},
    YEAR = {{ .PublicationDate.Year }}{{ end }}
}
